Mombasa Consolidated Monthly Report - Au.title: Mombasa Consolidated Monthly Report - August 2025
Mombasa Consolidated Monthly Report - Au.description: A consolidated summary of the Mombasa auctions for August 2025, including monthly averages, offerings, and regional production statistics. Total Offered: 777,699 packages. Auction Avg: $2.06.

Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2.title: Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2.description: Authoritative consolidated report for Sale 35 (1st/2nd Sept 2025). Synthesized from transaction data, multiple brokers, and weather data. Total Offered: 7.69 M/Kg. Auction Avg: $1.95.

Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2.title: Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2.description: Consolidated report for Sale 34 (1st/2nd Sept 2025). Total offerings: 5.10 M/Kgs. Good general demand. Best Westerns irregular; Uva seasonal teas sold well.

Limbe Consolidated Report - Week 35, 202.title: Limbe Consolidated Report - Week 35, 2025
Limbe Consolidated Report - Week 35, 202.description: Consolidated report for Sale 35 (27th Aug 2025). Fair demand for the 977,064 kilos on offer. Overall absorption similar to last sale.

Kolkata Consolidated Report - Week 34, 2.description: Kolkata summary for Week 34 (Ending 23rd Aug 2025). CTC: Good demand, Assams irregular, Dooars easier. ORTH: Strong demand. Includes World Crop data.

Guwahati Consolidated Report - Week 34,.description: Guwahati summary for Week 34 (Ending 23rd Aug 2025). CTC: Strong demand, good liquoring sorts firm to dearer. Avg: INR 212.05.

Siliguri Consolidated Report - Week 34,.description: Siliguri summary for Week 34 (Ending 23rd Aug 2025). CTC: Fair demand. Prices irregular following quality. Avg: INR 192.42.

South India Consolidated Report - Week 3.description: South India summary (Cochin, Coonoor, Coimbatore) for Week 34 (Ending 23rd Aug 2025). Generally good demand across centers, mostly firm to dearer.

Mombasa Consolidated Report - Week 34, 2.description: Consolidated report for Sale 34 (27th Aug 2025). Good demand at irregular rates. Auction Avg: $1.97.

Colombo Consolidated Report - Week 33, 2.description: Consolidated report for Sale 33 (26th/27th Aug 2025). Total offerings: 5.19 M/Kgs. Good general demand.
